This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS ORB should block opaque text/plain with nosniff
PASS ORB should block opaque-response-blocklisted MIME type with nosniff
FAIL ORB should block opaque response with empty Content-Type and nosniff assert_unreached: Should have rejected: undefined Reached unreachable code
PASS ORB shouldn't block opaque image with empty Content-Type and nosniff
Harness: the test ran to completion.
